description:
'''Secret Garden''' is an [[Ireland|Irish]]-[[Norwegians|Norwegian]] band specialised in [[New-age music|new instrumental music]], led by the [[Musical duo|duo]] consisting of Irish violinist and singer [[Fionnuala Sherry]] and Norwegian composer, arranger and pianist [[Rolf LÃ¸vland]].

The group came to fame when they won the [[Eurovision Song Contest 1995|1995 Eurovision Song Contest]], representing Norway with the composition "[[Nocturne (Secret Garden song)|Nocturne]]".  In the course of a partnership lasting over 25 years, they have sold millions of albums worldwide, many of which went platinum in numerous countries.
